body:
Change the stand-alone/smoke tests to use the (new) test stage directory automatically created for cached test sources (versus referencing and or using the files under the package's install prefix).

As a result, it is not necessary to create or remove a working directory.

@pghysels @balay @sshudler I had trouble building `strumpack` on the system I was testing so found it important to flag that the tests are being skipped based on what I could infer from the build failure.  I would appreciate your feedback on a better way to handle the tests and or if there are tests that can be run with different configurations.

TODO:
- [x] Resolve include issue with `test_sparse_seq.cpp`
title: strumpack: Update stand-alone test to use stage directory
